results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = binomial(n,k)^2 * binomial(2*(n-k), n-k).
comment: The square of the triangular matrix {binomial(n, k)^2}_{k=0..n} A008459 read by rows.
mathematica: T[ n_, k_] := Binomial[n, k]^2 Binomial[2 n - 2 k, n - k];
